Bolton soldier0194120l1htmrfavvq5zuqyrv2au1ep922dd51534692014-07-17T22:04:49ZArdilaun24498038{{Disambig}}
'''Bolton soldier''' may refer to:
#[[Locke]]: A lesser lord sworn to [[House Bolton]], and considered by [[Roose Bolton]] to be his best hunter. First appears in "[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]".
#[[Bolton soldier (Walk of Punishment)]]: A Bolton soldier in the group that captures Ser [[Jaime Lannister]] and [[Brienne of Tarth]]. He leads a group of other in singing "[[The Bear and the Maiden Fair (song)|The Bear and the Maiden Fair]]". Only appears in "[[Walk of Punishment]]".
#[[Master Torturer]]: Leads a group of others in the torture of [[Theon Greyjoy]]. First appears in "[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]". Killed by [[Ramsay Snow]] in "[[Walk of Punishment]]".
#[[Steelshanks]]: A Bolton man-at-arms charged with transporting Ser Jaime Lannister to [[King's Landing]]. Appears in "[[The Bear and the Maiden Fair (episode)|The Bear and the Maiden Fair]]".
#[[Bolton man 1]]: A Bolton soldier who aids Ramsay Snow in torturing Theon Greyjoy. First appears in "[[And Now His Watch is Ended]]".
#[[Bolton man 2]]: A Bolton soldier who aids Ramsay Snow in torturing Theon Greyjoy. First appears in "[[And Now His Watch is Ended]]".
#[[Bolton guard (The Laws of Gods and Men)]]: A guard at [[The Dreadfort]] and killed by [[Yara Greyjoy]] after leading her to the dungeons.
[[Category:Disambiguations]]
